Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.LoginController
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the interaction between client and server during the login phase of a Player.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(GUIManager manager)
      Parameters:
      manager - the GUIManager to set the JoinGameController manager attribute to

    • pressed

      public void pressed()
      Handles the pressing of the Connect button.

    • connectReleased

      public void connectReleased()
      Handles the releasing of the Connect button. Notices the GUIManager that the Connect button was clicked, putting the input inserted in the TextBox (Server IP address) on the messageQueue.

    • chooseReleased

      public void chooseReleased()
      Handles the releasing of the Choose button. When the Player inserts a valid nickname in the TextBox, notices the GUIManager that the Choose button was clicked, putting the input on the messageQueue. Until the inserted nickname is not valid, an error message appears and it's not possible to continue.

    • chooseNickname

      public void chooseNickname()
      Allows the Player to choose his nickname. Sets an empty textBox as visible, and allows clicking on a Connect button when a valid nickname is inserted.

    • errorMessage

      public void errorMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Allows displaying an error message:
      • when the inserted server IP address is not valid;
      • when the inserted nickname is not valid.
      Parameters:
      message - the String describing the error message
